name: Scott Main
summary: Teacher with 11 years of experience, specializing in Classroom Management, Behavioral Development, Motivating and Mentoring, Educating, Counseling and Teaching. Proficient in age-appropriate lesson planning, positive learning environments, and differentiated instruction.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Instructed through lectures, discussions and demonstrations in Math, Science, Social Studies, Language Arts, Reading and Spelling. Assigned lessons and corrected homework. Attended professional development workshops focused on learning goals, classroom management, student motivation and engaging activities. Served on committees and projects including Your Choice, Emergency Planning and Safe School. Facilitated activities promoting students' physical, emotional and social growth. Used positive reinforcement to redirect behavior. Conducted small group and individual activities with differentiated learning needs. Worked with an average of 30 students per class. Participated in ongoing staff training.

experience.title: Coach
experience.description: Coached Boys Freshmen Basketball and Boys Middle School Basketball.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Created an After School Detention program to curb bad behavior and avoid suspensions. Served as principal in the building in the principal's absence. Implemented lesson planning strategies to improve total comprehension. Integrated technology to increase student participation and scores. Regular parent communication to discuss student issues and course weaknesses. Encouraged extracurricular involvement. Elected member of Building Leadership Committee. Received an Achievement Award.

experience.title: Campus Security Officer
experience.description: Patrolled campus interior and exterior. Provided jump starts, escorts, addressed incidents such as break-ins, speeding tickets, parking violations, and reporting. 24-hour campus security throughout the year.

experience.title: Supervisor
experience.description: Supervised a staff of 3. Scheduled staff hours and ordered products (diapers, food, wipes, cleaning supplies). Arranged trips to pools, parks and picnics. Produced plays for church performances. Wrote staff reviews and reports to the pastor. Marketed to increase enrollment. Supervised children as needed. Assisted with diaper changing and basic care. Communicated daily with parents and prepared daily reports.

experience.title: Loss Prevention Security Officer
experience.description: Monitored security systems for signs of theft and misappropriation indicators. Provided escorts as needed. Prepared detailed reports for management, MPs, courts, and base commander's office.

experience.title: Supervisor for Outdoor Living Department
experience.description: Supervised 7 sales associates in the outdoor living department at Scott AFB Main Exchange. Scheduled staff, conducted appraisals, ordered products, phased out unsuccessful items, and reported to management. Performed inventory tasks, loaded and moved pallets, and helped unload pallets of paving stones and outdoor equipment.
